title: World mission 2017
body:
I played all my missions and the last one says"A Real Challenger:Complete 4 more wolrd mission" to get 25 tokens.
I finished my missions and i have 3/4 and new missions doesn't pop up what can i do??

replies.body: Everyone should be at 3/4 progress currently.  Due to a bug, though, some players got extra credit towards their Overall mission and seeing Legendary Pursuit.  Everyone still has the same amount of time to complete their Overall missions before the event is over.  Sorry for the confusion here.  :(
I played all my missions and i have 1/4 and i dont know what i must do no
Do you have the Worlds Mission pass?  You'll need that for the two additional credits towards the mission.
